summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5640 for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 3, Midland Addition, unrecorded, as established by Ordinance No. 60348, being the alleys in the block bounded by North 76th Street, North 77th Street, Aurora Avenue, and Winona Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74354, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
